name: Raceabout
description:
You're stuck racing in a circle while obstacles are appearing around you! Try to make it as many laps as possible.

Controls Keyboard

Use A/D or Left Arrow/Right Arrow to move in or out the circle.

Controller

Tilt the left analog stick left or right to move in or out of the circle. Unfortunately, the menu doesn't seem to work with a controller.

Credits

Art: Sag05

Programming: Joll05 & Weirddan

Music: Weirddan

Screenshots coming soon
